attributes.action: Make organic plant based food cheaper than processed chemical filled rubbish!
attributes.additional_details:
Make ‘organic’, ‘ethically produced’ ‘plant based food’ cheaper to buy than all the processed chemical filled cancer causing rubbish in all the supermarkets!?!

By doing so you would be making ‘eating healthy’ accessible to everyone! Which in turn will REALLY help combat climate change, help take the strain off the nhs as - if more people could afford to feed their family organic plant based goodness there would be an epidemic of healthy people; less with cancer, less obese!
attributes.background:
Our government say that they are trying to battle climate change, they say the NHS is over used and not enough staff; they say they are tackling Britain’s apparent obesity issues.

NOTHING I see done is good enough.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about organic, plant-based food but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to make these foods cheaper than other types of food.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do, for example calling for increased subsidies for organic farming, if that's something you'd like to happen.
